[上海浦东/外企] 传统外企招.net 开发， 955WLB
收集整理了一些 AI 相关的链接和项目，简单做了个导航站，目前还在收集中，有推荐的可以回复我加上

Torantulino /

      Auto-GPT---An experimental open-source attempt to make GPT-4 fully autonomous.

apple /

      ml-stable-diffusion---Stable Diffusion with Core ML on Apple Silicon

microsoft /

      JARVIS---JARVIS, a system to connect LLMs with ML community

PathOfBuildingCommunity /

      PathOfBuilding---Offline build planner for Path of Exile.

mckaywrigley /

      ai-code-translator---Use AI to translate code from one language to another.

sindresorhus /

      awesome---😎 Awesome lists about all kinds of interesting topics

hahahumble /

      speechgpt---SpeechGPT is a web application that enables you to converse with ChatGPT.

donnemartin /

      system-design-primer---Learn how to design large-scale systems. Prep for the system design interview. Includes Anki flashcards.

EbookFoundation /

      free-programming-books---📚 Freely available programming books

lm-sys /

      FastChat---The release repo for "Vicuna: An Open Chatbot Impressing GPT-4"

topjohnwu /

      Magisk---The Magic Mask for Android

stochasticai /

      xturing---Build and control your own LLMs

rustformers /

      llama-rs---Run LLaMA inference on CPU, with Rust 🦀🚀🦙

helix-editor /

      helix---A post-modern modal text editor.

ymcui /

      Chinese-LLaMA-Alpaca---中文LLaMA&Alpaca大语言模型+本地部署 (Chinese LLaMA & Alpaca LLMs)

gothinkster /

      realworld---"The mother of all demo apps" — Exemplary fullstack Medium.com clone powered by React, Angular, Node, Django, and many more

DarkFlippers /

      unleashed-firmware---Flipper Zero Unleashed Firmware

OptimalScale /

      LMFlow---An Extensible Toolkit for Finetuning and Inference of Large Foundation Models. Large Language Model for All. 共建大模型社区，让每个人都训得起大模型。

twitter /

      the-algorithm---Source code for Twitter's Recommendation Algorithm

DeSinc /

      SallyBot---AI Chatbot coded in Discord.net C#

terrastruct /

      d2---D2 is a modern diagram scripting language that turns text to diagrams.

Synaptrix /

      ChatGPT-Desktop---ChatGPT 跨平台客户端，快捷键快速唤醒窗口，问答快人一步！

microsoft /

      ML-For-Beginners---12 weeks, 26 lessons, 52 quizzes, classic Machine Learning for all

twitter /

      the-algorithm-ml---Source code for Twitter's Recommendation Algorithm

Yidadaa /

      ChatGPT-Next-Web---一键拥有你自己的 ChatGPT 网页服务。 One-Click to deploy your own ChatGPT web UI.
